author: pfmoore
body:
I am on Windows 10, and I have installed Powershell Core 7, and run Update-Help as administrator. However, when I execute the command `get-help about_AutomaticVariables` (for example) I get an error:

```
>get-help about_automaticvariables
Get-Help: Get-Help could not find about_automaticvariables in a help file in this session. To download updated help topics type: "Update-Help". To get help online, search for the help topic in the TechNet library at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116.
```

Update-Help gives an error, which suggests that my default UI culture (en-GB) might be relevant, but explicitly requesting en-US makes no difference:

```
>update-help
Update-Help: Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'PSDesiredStateConfiguration, ThreadJob, WindowsUpdateProvider' with UI culture(s) {en-GB} : One or more errors occurred. (Response status code does not indicate success: 404 (The specified blob does not exist.).).
English-US help content is available and can be installed using: Update-Help -UICulture en-US.
Update-Help: Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'ConfigDefender, Defender, HgsClient, HgsDiagnostics, Microsoft.PowerShell.Operation.Validation, UEV, Whea, WindowsDeveloperLicense' with UI culture(s) {en-GB} : A Help URI cannot contain more than 10 redirections. Specify a valid Help URI..
English-US help content is available and can be installed using: Update-Help -UICulture en-US.
>Update-Help -UICulture en-US
Update-Help: Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'PSDesiredStateConfiguration, ThreadJob, WindowsUpdateProvider' with UI culture(s) {en-US} : One or more errors occurred. (Response status code does not indicate success: 404 (The specified blob does not exist.).).
English-US help content is available and can be installed using: Update-Help -UICulture en-US.
Update-Help: Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'ConfigDefender, Defender, HgsClient, HgsDiagnostics, Microsoft.PowerShell.Operation.Validation, UEV, Whea, WindowsDeveloperLicense' with UI culture(s) {en-US} : A Help URI cannot contain
 more than 10 redirections. Specify a valid Help URI..
English-US help content is available and can be installed using: Update-Help -UICulture en-US.
```

Even if I have made some mistake in updating the help, the error messages are not informative in suggesting a solution.

comments.author: pfmoore
comments.body:
User error - I was mistyping `about_Automatic_Variables` (missed out the second underscore).

Arguably the message is still unhelpful, but ultimately this was my mistake. Sorry for the noise.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT perhaps we could reuse the fuzzy matcher from the command not found exception here?

title: Missing help? Update-Help doesn't fix the issue.
